Gloss: he, she, it; himself, herself, itself; same
myself (genitive form; there is no nominative)
yourself (genitive form; there is no nominative)
(of) one another (reciprocal pronoun; the genitive plural is the lexical form)
as much as, as many as; as great as; all that
of such a kind, such as this, such
and I; even I (= καί + ἐγω–used for emphasis or contrast)
